context_of_use: This use case allows power users to execute bulk actions to improve their efficiency in managing data.
stakeholders_and_interests: power user: improve efficiency in data management
description: Provide power users the ability to execute bulk actions (e.g., updates, imports, or deletions) to improve efficiency.
preconditions: User is authenticated and has power user privileges.
postconditions: Bulk operations are successfully executed and reflected in the system.
assumptions: The user has the necessary permissions to perform bulk operations.
The system supports bulk operations functionality.
requirements_met: The system shall allow power users to perform bulk operations to enhance efficiency.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the types of bulk operations supported by the system.
main_flow: 1. User selects bulk operation type → System displays available bulk operation options.
2. User specifies the data for the bulk operation → System validates the input data.
3. User confirms the bulk operation → System executes the bulk operation and updates the system.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 2): If the input data is invalid, then the system displays an error message and prompts the user to correct the data.
